Field Label:
measurement from the upper border of the symphysis pubis to the floor*, to the nearest 0.1 centimeter

*If it is difficult to locate the symphysis pubis, the sitting height should be measured (see protocol for Sitting Height below). The sitting height measurement can be subtracted from the standing height measurement to determine the value for the lower segment.
measurement of the upper body segment by subtracting the lower segment from the standing height for the upper segment measurement
Ratio of the upper segment measurement over the lower segment
